pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Change Point Detection for High-Dimensional VAR Models // Implements the algorithm introduced in Tian, Y., and Safikhani, A. (2024) doi:10.5705/ss.202024.0182, "Sequential Change Point Detection in High-dimensional Vector Auto- regressive Models". This package provides tools for detecting change points in the transition matrices of VAR models, effectively identifying shifts in temporal and cross- correlations within high-dimensional time series data.
